website_summaries.verdict: A subtle, understated clog that emphasizes comfort.
pros: Slip-on style with attractive goring at instep
Comes in Supernavy, Deep Plum, Timberwolf, Black, Bungee Cord and Chocolate
Built-in arch contour, EVA midsole with Microwobbleboard technology
Heel measures 1.25-inches, platform measures three quarters of an inch
cons: May run wide, so keep this in mind when ordering

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing quality seems to be lacking or design was changed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with my FitFlop mocs. I have used them regularly since my podiatrist recommended them some years ago. They are narrow and the wobble board cushion doesn’t seem to be there. I wore them to work today and my feet are sore after only a few hours! Was the design changed? Quality seems altered.I just checked this pair with all the others I have and it does not have a fitflop “stamp”on the bottom of the Mocs as my others do. ?????
customer_reviews.author: K. Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide so socks are a must
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in size 8. They fit snugly so I ordered them in a 9. The 9 is very wide across the arch which makes your foot slide; no half sizes! I have also noticed these new style Fitflops push your foot to the outside rather than stabilizing the foot. I put a Merrill insert in the shoe and it helped. Also wearing socks helps. Fitflops need to stay true to their original design which stabilized the foot along with cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha103

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed on top and feels like someone wore these for weeks
customer_reviews.text: Just received, tool pit of box. Scuffed on top and feels like someone wore these for weeks, I'm a size 10 for all 5 pair of FF I own and these are stretched out and beat up. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE FitFlops! I've had several pairs of thong sandals and several pairs of loafers. I've loved them all. This is my first pair of clogs and I love them. I had a very painful case of plantar faciitis and fitflops were the only shoes I could wear. My feet are ok now thanks to fitflops. I recommend them to everyone I talk to (about shoes). Just can't say enough good things about these clogs. They are stylish, versatile and the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cut off circulation on my wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to report that this clog didn't work for me. I do have a very wide foot due to a bunion and hammer toe. My shoes have to be wide enough to let my food splay out and still have a deep toe box. This initially felt great but soon started to cut off circulation in both feet. I have 6 pair of the fit flop sandals that I love, but these won't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: These are not as wide at the toes as Fitflops previous suede clogs.
customer_reviews.text: These fitflop suede clogs are not near as wide at the toe section as my old ones. My old ones have the much wider and rounder section at the toe. I have narrow foot so this works for me; however very dissappointed Fitflops are not making them like the previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Fits D width feet perfect
customer_reviews.text: Suede is very nice, soft outside and inside, I have wide feet D width and these are perfect. No pressure on my instep, I have the black color. Color does not fade onto socks nor my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes you will ever wear. Especially if you are on your feet long hours. I own many different pairs of fitflop. Love them all
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Super Navy Appears Black
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of loaf suede clogs. Fit flops are always comfortable and these are no different. My other pair are bungee grey/brown. These were advertised as super navy but they are so dark they look black. In the photo I’m wearing black slacks and the carpet is very dark blue for comparison. The blue are higher priced than the black and that looks to be the only difference. I’m keeping them, but these sure don’t look like navy!
customer_reviews.author: PatinVT

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I bought them first in the color Bungee since they were on sale and now I have to have them in every color. I waited until the navy went on sale and now have those. These shoes are so lightweight and comfortable. I have issues with my knees and these seem to help alleviate some pain for me. They are so cushy and provide great support to the arch. Now will wait for the black ones to drop in price and will order those as well.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM !!!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for a week now and I LOVE THEM. I'm on my feet all day long and need a shoe that has support but is comfortable at the same time (which is very hard to find). I ordered a 7 and although I wouldn't say they runs large, they are little roomy on me. If I wear a little thicker sock it's fine. I wouldn't order a smaller size unless this shoe stretches out, but I haven't had it long enough yet to know if that will happen. Either way I'll order another pair when they get my size back in.
customer_reviews.author: JoanieO

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love Fitflops. They fit me well and provide the comfort and support I need. I have a fibroma attached to the plantar fascia on one foot and Fitflops have been the only shoes that really work for me and keeps me out of pain. I have 3 pair of this particular shoe and it fits true to size. I like that this clog has a more narrow look, less clunky than the chunkier clogs so they look better with a work outfit. Also, the suede is very appealing. Great shoe all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. CCS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever worn Fitflop and they really are very comfortable and the size is pretty much true. Like others reported they do run narrow which if you normally wear a wider shoe or have a high instep or wear winter socks you definitely need to order the wide width. Mine are a little snug, I ordered the 7 even though I normally wear 6.5 thinking that would compensate but the 6.5 wide width I think would have been perfect width and size. I would definitely try these shoes again they are well made. Someone ask heel size, on size 7 it’s exactly 2inches.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Fit Flops are incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Fit flops save my feet! I have Mortons Neuroma and fit flops are the best for relieving the pain. This clog is super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: jane Riley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable clogs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these FitFlop clogs! This is the third pair I’ve purchased over the last several years and they are always comfortable. Great arch support and good if you have plantar fasciitis. I keep a pair to wear when I’m out and another to use for slippers in the house. They wear and last well. I still have and wear all 3 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: DKWyatt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Worth $
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of clogs by fitflop because they're so comfy. I love them. My feet require good quality comfortable shoes. This is the first pair that does not have slippery sole, so they're safer for work. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Hard shoe
customer_reviews.text: I dislike these intensely. They don't flex well with the foot. The top is also too tight. Unfortunately I missed the return window. I like my earlier fit flops. These are...a flop! I bought a pair of sandals as well, same thing.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable, no break-in necessary
customer_reviews.text: When I got my shoes, i immediately had to put them on. I have to say, my poor feet gave a whimper of delight! I have never had a pair of shoes feel so incredibly comfortable from the very first. I have problem feet, and I have a job in where I stand.for eight hours. These.are worth their.weight in gold.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is My Second Pair of These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First purchased this shoe in January 2019. An absolute favorite in comfort. I have been using that pair for trips outside the house during COVID. Just bought a second pair, which I will use as my winter house slippers. There's nothing like these shoes for comfort for my slightly wide feet with high arches. Happy repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Happy & Blessed Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kind of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I prefer step in shoes that provide good arch support. FitFlops are the best fit flops I ever tried. They are comfortable and stay on with little effort so when I discovered they come in slide in shoe I had to try them! There was no break-in period, stretching by various means and no discomfort. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wore them constantly all last winter when I broke my arm bad, had to have shoulder replacement surgery, and was not able to put on socks or tie shoes. They were the perfect solution ... easy to put on, comfortable, yet supportive. Just bought my second pair so I now have them in navy and black.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover21

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are too narrow in the width and not high enough in the toebox to accommodate a sock. These shoes should definitely come in a wider width.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because I own a pair of FitFlop sandals that I wear ALL the time at home. The fit and comfort of the sandals can't be beat. I am happy to report that these are just as successful! I ordered an 8, the same size as my sandals, and my feet feel snug and secure in them. They give comfort and support and came in my favorite color, purple! Thank you FitFlop!! I now bought my 2nd pair of suede mules, this time in black. These shoes are the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: dinahcat

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe-gift EVER!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years ago I bought a pair of FitFlop sandals for my sister-in-law that lives in eastern Europe. She's been wearing that pair every summer since. This year I spotted these slides and sent them to her for a July birthday gift. She sent an email saying they are the best shoes ever! She is in her 70s and loves the arch support and the feel. Everyday she's walking the dog and going to the shops; these are her go-to shoes for all activities.
customer_reviews.author: NE1410S

customer_reviews.title: Great clogs
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews I read said these clogs run small. I wear an 8.5 so I went up to a 9. The fit is perfect. I was concerned about the sole not being made of the same material as my sandals. Once I had the clogs on for about an hour the pain in my knees were gone. So I am pleased with the soles. There were other reviews about the soles being slick. Have not noticed any issues but having been forewarned I am being a little more cautious. Over all I am very happy with these clogs and will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Grives

customer_reviews.title: Love FitFlops
customer_reviews.text: I have severe arthritis in my feet so I live in FitFlops. My clogs were wearing out (after several years of wearing them all the time). I just ordered these and they are a little different fit but they will do and look so nice and new...I can wear them out about town. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MtOlive

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe. It is comfortable and fits perfectly. They give such good support and I can walk all say in them without my back or feet hurting. I have been buying them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I have lived in these since receiving. I ordered these in 2 colors and wear them daily. I have real problems with my feet due to ankle breaks and require extra support and comfort. These provide both of these things. I can walk all day without pain! I have worn the fit flop thongs for years and am elated they have their line to include shoes I can wear comfortably in winter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B Sternberger

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very comfortable as soon as I put them on. My foot is narrow, and my feet slide around too much in most clogs. These however gave me room to add an orthotic, and are just right. The color is a very dark navy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2 nd pair. They are the absolute best shoes I’ve ever owned. They are super comfortable and you can wear them for 12 hours and my feet don’t hurt.
customer_reviews.author: swilliams

customer_reviews.title: Cut smaller than years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same shoes several years ago. I needed to go up a full size in my latest order. The toe is more rounded (more attractive). If you wore these years ago please order a full size up. Yes, they are the same awesome comfort level!
customer_reviews.author: KayKay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with my big toe joint. These shoes are one of the few I can wear without being in pain. I wore their FitFlop sandals all summer and was thrilled to find they had shoes I could wear in winter. They have superior footbed technology.
customer_reviews.author: Peony

customer_reviews.title: dangerous shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pairs after wearing the one I sent the other unused back. very dangerous shoe very loose and big so when you walk your foot can go sideways extremely easy in side the shoe cause you too fall which happened several times. I discarded the first pair very dangerous shoe. However I do lie Fit Flop Products especially some of there sandals they are extremely comfortable and great for people with plantar fascitis
customer_reviews.author: Manalapan Mary

customer_reviews.title: These are nice shoes. It seems that FitFlops has improved the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes. It seems that FitFlops has improved the inside of the shoe for comfort. Several years ago I bought a pair, they were so hard in the foot bed, I kept them but rarely wore they because they were just not comfortable. These are wonderfully soft inside and have good arch support. Very much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love these Fitflops
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have bought of the same shoes. I wore the others into the ground. They are still in pretty good shape and have held up really well but the suede is a bit stained so they will be for home and garden. They fit true to size. Nice color for cool and warm weather. I sometimes need a wide but this medium fit allows for a good amt of toe room. The shipping was fast and although a bit pricey for me it is worth it for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: NYgalinNJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: A committed FitFlop customer, I desperately wanted these clogs but they were not available in my size. They run large and the size 8 that I ordered was too big all over. ;-(
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically always a size 7. I ordered size 7 first and it was too big so I reordered size 6. The 6 was too small. I wish they came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Frances S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, great for my recovery from plantar fasciitis. I love the color (bungi cord ) and the shoes so much that I bought a second pair in another color. Good with socks or without. I have wide feet, so I was concerned about the medium width, but they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: prof

customer_reviews.title: Plum FitFlops
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first that the camel/orange pair I bought in 2015 was discontinued because I really enjoyed them a lot but today I received the plum ones and love them just as much. A bit tight from being new, but they will loosen in time since they will be my everyday shoe. Color is NOT too bright like I was afraid it may be. LOVE THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: countryatthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the Loaff Suade Clog - fit is perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Loaff Suade Clog - fit is perfect ( I wear a 61/2 but in FitFlop I wear a 6 -these are not as cluncky as my other pair of FitFlop shoes I think they are called Groughs (spelling?) these are very comfortable can wear all day -
customer_reviews.author: Carmy

customer_reviews.title: Great as slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have heel pain, so I have to wear supportive footwear even when in the house. No going barefoot for me. I only wear fit flop mules for slippers now. Great comfort and support and not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: sur_review

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE “FITFLOPS”
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! Super comfy and fit well! Easy peasy off and on. I wear a lot of Vionic brand, because I had plantar fasciitis (which is gone) ..these do not give you the Vionic kind of arch support, but they are not causing me any pain either!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Casole

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small
customer_reviews.text: The opening for your foot is not big enough to get your foot in and I don’t even have a high instep. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Esj

customer_reviews.title: comfy, but
customer_reviews.text: I have several fit flop sandals that I love so thought I would try these for the winter. I like the look and feel of these. However, I wish they came in half sizes as neither the smaller or larger is exactly right for me. The larger felt too big and smaller too short. I am wearing the smaller but truly need a smidge more length to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a size 7
customer_reviews.text: I had originally ordered a size 8, as that is the size that I wear in a regular shoe. However, it was too big, and the size 7 fit perfectly. A little short, but since there is no back on this shoe it was OK. Normally Fit-bit shoes run wide and they slide around on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Was experiencing heel pain and these shoes have made a vast improvement in the way I feel. I wear them in the house, on hardwood floors and the heel pain has diminished greatly!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Iselin

customer_reviews.title: I love them! So comfortable and I can already feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them! So comfortable and I can already feel a difference in how my back and knees feel. Previous knee injury often times flares up for various reasons and I've noticed a big difference since wearing these clogs; along with physical therapy. Love them; well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angieb1

customer_reviews.title: Miss the originals
customer_reviews.text: Not the same foot bed as used to have so returned them.
customer_reviews.author: waletti

customer_reviews.title: I love my clogs!!
customer_reviews.text: I havent had cligs for a ling while. Glad i found these. Very cozy comfy on my feet. And warm in the winter with a warm pair of sox. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY FEET
customer_reviews.text: Best clogs ever. I am on my feet 6 hours at a time, and have been having trouble finding the right shoes for metatarsal pain. FITFLOP once again for the win. Normally wear a 9.5. Ordered the 9, too short. 10 is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: The perfect brand of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love, love Fitflop!!!! Perfect shoe brand for problem feet, knees and back. I own 15 pairs. My feet will tolerate no other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for style, comfort and price!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 and ordered that size. They fit good and are so comfortable. I've had back surgery and need shoes that support and look good. These do both. I now own two pairs of this brand and cannot say enough good things about them. Highly recommend also if you have foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: H. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: FitFlop Suede Clogs
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked more cushion in the shoe like the actual FitFlops you wear in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Relief from all day standing
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, as a nurse, it helped her a lot from standing all day in the Operating Room. She felt relief.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: like walking on cushions
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom, who has rheumatoid arthritis. FitFlops slippers and shoes are extremely comfortable for her gnarled up feet... "like walking on cushions" She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: The brand fits wide
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping the clog would not be a wide, but fits wide for a size 10 if you have a regular/narrow width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent clog, great fitflop base, but a bit smaller fit.
customer_reviews.text: Had bought a similar a couple years ago and loved using as my slippers; these aren’t quite as comfortable of a fit as my previous purchase, but they are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Z

customer_reviews.title: Love the mule style fitflops
customer_reviews.text: I love these slip on fitflops...this is my 3rd pair. They are my daily go-to. Hope this style persists!!!
customer_reviews.author: eaglespirits

customer_reviews.title: I need the wider toe size 8 black clog, pscary@suddenlink.net
customer_reviews.text: Tor area too narrow ones I had before were roomier is there a wide in size 8 Toe area too narrow is there an 8 wide?is there a wider toe area in black sued, size 8 pscary@suddenlink.net
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is attractive and comfortable although not as comfortable as the original clogs. They are not as wide but do accommodate my bunions
customer_reviews.author: Dennis reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Needs more room.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but smaller than expected. One of the features of fit flops is the roominess. I know that what I am used to wearing from them is open, but it's wide enough! I expected the same from the closed shoe. I can wear them but not without discomfort by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Tabor

customer_reviews.title: They feel fantastic and aren't too bulky or heavy
customer_reviews.text: If you want comfort, get these. They feel fantastic and aren't too bulky or heavy. Perfect for wearing at home, for errands, etc.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and feel sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these clogs. I had surgery on my heal last May and cannot wear shoes with a back. These are attractive for dresses as well as pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Fitflops!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these shoes and loves how they look and the fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as expected right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my fit flops and have several pair of them- both sandals and clogs. For someone with many foot issues (plantar fasciitis, neuroma, and bunion) they all help me get through the day. These are no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I practically wear them all the time. They are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stansel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and support at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe worked great for my 78 year-old mother who had previously worn Easy Spirit mules. With each step, she "feels a bounce". She advises to wear socks as the suede will make bare feet sweat. Also, If getting in supernavy blue, shoes look black upon opening but blue can be seen in the light.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Montanari

customer_reviews.title: Best support ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time with shoes - the fit flop brand seems to be the only type that doesn’t cause back and leg problems. I’ve never tried their closed shoes before. It fit great. Was comfortable. I know I will love them, the more I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynMama

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable clog that stays on
customer_reviews.text: These clogs are very comfortable and stay on my feet even when walking up and down stairs. The style of the clog is also very attractive for such a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Bisch

customer_reviews.title: Great for metatarsal support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome!! I was having horrible metatarsal pain and these were the only shoes that helped. They mold to your feet and give great support. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Mom and she loved them! She can’t stop talking about how comfortable they are. She will be purchasing other colors. She is a 6 1/2 wide but I got her a 7 medium and they fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Joseline

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: It came earlier than expected and these shoes are very comfortable. I’m able to wear my ankle brace with them (due to recent surgery) and they still fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for work.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes ! I wear them for work, on my feet 8 hours a day. This is my 3rd pair of Fit-Flops. I would recommend them to anyone. Good for people with wide feet. I ordered an 8 & it fits perfectly. That is the size I always wear, so it's a true 8 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McClaran

customer_reviews.title: Love Fit Flop. This mule not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Rubbed on upper rt foot. Well made. Not comfy. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort A+, long lasting style
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick sole for comfort, toe box could be a little wider for me, but acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Ms Woody907

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not up to regular fit of fit flops, not thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these constantly and they are extremely comfortable as well as cute! I have heel pain and these shoes help it tremendously, even though they are not advertised to do so.
customer_reviews.author: kpc

customer_reviews.title: FitFlop suede clog
customer_reviews.text: I love these comforatable shoes! The only thing is that sometimes my heels hit the back of the shoe so I wish they were a tad bit longer - maybe 1/4 of an inch....
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: FitFlop's
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old FitFlop's. I did not like the style the fit of the new one FitFlop's.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie bilrs

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits exactly! I was actually hoping for it to be a little larger, because as is, I can't wear socks with it. I haven't worn them yet, due to a toe issue, but I'm looking forward to it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This pair is ok but doesn’t seem to be like the old kind
customer_reviews.text: What’s happening with fit flop? I’ve worn them for ten years plus now I can’t find the old gogh moc in my size? Have they changed? This pair is ok but doesn’t seem to be like the old kind.
customer_reviews.author: janem

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes for months now and they are definitely holding up with no sign of wear & tear. I will be buying another pair in a different color. Very comfy, easy to step in and out of and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S Principe

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair that are years old, I don't even know when I got them. I still wear them. I wanted another pair. Just as good as my older pair. I have this pair for not even a year and I can tell the tread on the bottom is starting to separating. Not what I expected from this well made brand of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Harvell

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable clog I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe after researching for a shoe to help with hip arthritis and knee issues. This is the most comfortable clog I have ever worn, and my knee and hip pain is definitely less while wearing these shoes than any other shoe I have tried. I would definitely recommend and I will definitely purchase more FitFlop products.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: So very comfortable to wear - love them. Great color to match just about everything. FitFlops are my favorite - I have a dozen pairs at least. Only thing I can wear to help my abused feet.
customer_reviews.author: It's me 22

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love fit flops and these have plenty of room to be comfortable but aren’t overly wide
customer_reviews.author: clara

customer_reviews.title: Fit Flop Fan for Life
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent. Great foot support. I like the look, too.
customer_reviews.author: Treesia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of shoes. They have great arch support and are very comfortable. The only downfall is that my feet get very warm in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Super-comfortable, stylish clogs to wear every single day
customer_reviews.text: Love these - they're light to wear, warm without being sweaty and the colour goes really well with denim. I would have usually bought a half size smaller but no half sizes were available... so I went up half a size and glad I did as I'll be wearing them with socks heading into winter and can feel that little bit of extra room will be useful.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Classic slipper/loafer, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our daughter, she loves them. Daughter loves the sturdy soles that allows her to walk outside when necessary. Daughter says they are so comfy and sturdy that she is tempted to wear them to the market.
customer_reviews.author: Billie caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable. I have many FitFlop clog styles for work and I think this is the most comfy...glad I purchased two pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nanio

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes..never painful, easy to work in and walk. Good arch support. Look very nice with dressy or casual. Third pair!!
customer_reviews.author: LHT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I can wear all day long. I have wide high arch feet and these are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: captainRC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Super comfortable. I have heel problems and these shoes are a godsend. I can be on my feet all day in these. I have them in every color and for summer I have tons of the fit flop sandles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An all day shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of Fit Flops- I keep coming back because they are such comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for problem feet or healthy feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of foot problems and finding Fitflops has been a real Blessing to me. They gave me my life back. I have recommended them to so many people with foot problems. Everyone that I know feels the same way that I do. I wear them every day. Thank you Fitflops ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Hines

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes On The Planet!!! And Doctor Revommened!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My All Time Favorite Shoe...What on earth did I ever do without these!!! I have worn out only two pair of these....after four years of wearing them almost constantly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Rauterkuss

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Too wide. Need a little more support. So like them as I'm a huge fan of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: VJ McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great clogs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mother in law, she says they are super comfortable and she's extremely pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Maayan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable clogs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of flip flops. I really like them. I find them hard to always get the one I want in my size. I’m assuming it’s due to the popularity of the clog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FitFlop Women's Loaff Suede Clogs
product_meta.description: FitFlop super-utilitarian loafer clogs have everything you need – soft padded uppers, elastic inserts for a foot-hugging adjustable fit, and a lightweight version of their super cushioned microwobbleboard midsoles. This season in suede, these are simple, practical, running around shoes, that are so fabulously comfortable, you’ll forget you have feet.
feature_bullets: Pressure-diffusing midsole with 3 levels of targeted cushioning. Biomechanically engineered
Firm cushioning at heel reduces impact
Soft in the middle to maximise comfort
Medium at the toes to help you ‘push off’
